# SOURCE: NREL Annual Technology Baselin: # UNITS: USD per unit as specified in cost_metric column; installation_cost_pct is percentage of equipment cost for labor
# LOGIC: Costs derived from NREL ATB 2024 (PV
column5: global benchmarks)
column7: and industry surveys. Utility-scale pricing used for large energy systems; small-scale/agricultural pricing for processing equipment.

# SOURCE: NREL Annual Technology Baselin: # ASSUMPTIONS: (1) All costs normalized to 2024 USD
IRENA Renewable Power Generation Costs: (2) PV costs in $/WAC (NREL ATB standard) converted to $/kW for consistency
BloombergNEF Battery Price Survey 2024: (3) LFP battery costs reflect total system installed cost not pack-only
DOE Solar Cost Benchmarks Q1 2024: (4) Wind costs reflect IRENA global weighted average
column5: (5) BWRO costs from peer-reviewed literature range
column6: (6) Sinai remote location may add 15-25% to typical installation costs (not included in base values)

# SOURCE: NREL Annual Technology Baselin: # DATA_QUALITY: HIGH - Primary sources from US DOE national laboratories (NREL)
# COMPARISON_TO_TOY: (1) PV system costs align well - toy $850/kW vs research $1150-1560/kW (toy may reflect module-only or non-US market pricing)
IRENA Renewable Power Generation Costs: (2) Battery LFP toy $280/kWh vs research $283/kWh (excellent match for residential benchmark)
DOE Solar Cost Benchmarks Q1 2024: (4) BWRO costs in toy are lower than research range (toy may represent simplified systems)
